description:
'''Janney Mar√≠n '''"'''Chiquis'''" '''Rivera ''' (born June 26, 1985) is an American singer and television personality. She is the eldest daughter of singer [[Jenni Rivera]]. She began her singing career in early 2014, releasing her first single "Paloma Blanca" as a tribute to her mother.

She made her television debut with her reality show ''[[Jenni Rivera Presents: Chiquis & Raq-C]]'' and also appeared on her mother's hit spin-off reality show ''[[I Love Jenni]]''. Rivera's debut album, ''[[Ahora (Chiquis Rivera album)|Ahora]]'', was released on June 2, 2015. On April 7, 2015, she released her memoir titled ''Forgiveness'', and a second on February 2, 2022 titled ''Unstoppable''.

Rivera is the recipient of three [[Latin Grammy Awards]], two [[Lo Nuestro Awards]], and two [[Grammy]] nominations.
